ability.name: Repel
ability.flavor: They aren't going anywhere, but you might!
ability.trigger: The target takes damage or is force moved.

metadata.flavor: They aren't going anywhere, but you might!

effects.effect: The target takes half the triggering damage, or the distance of the triggering forced movement is reduced by a number of squares equal to your Reason score. If the target took damage and was force moved, you choose the effect. If the forced movement is reduced to 0 squares, the target can push the source of the forced movement a number of squares equal to your Reason score.
